pinyin: Wu3 han4 Gang1 tie3 Gong1 si1

definition: Beijing Steel and Iron Institute (the former name of 北京科技大學|北京科技大学[Bei3 jing1 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2], University of Science and Technology Beijing)

sentences.english: The village now attracts businesses interested in shipping, steel, tobacco and textiles.
sentences.chinese: 现在华西村开始开发船运，钢铁，烟草和纺织业。

sentences.english: The Liberation Arm is the steel Great Wall of motherland.
sentences.chinese: 解放军是祖国的钢铁长城。

sentences.english: Italy's metal-workers' union calls goes on strike.
sentences.chinese: 意大利钢铁工人联盟发起罢工。

sentences.english: Lingyuan Iron and Steel Group Co. , Ltd.
Do the steelworkers have a case?
When the steel was placed in ice water and hit with a hammer, it shattered.
sentences.chinese: 当钢铁被安放在冰水中并用锤子敲打时，它碎掉了。

sentences.english: And then there was the steel.
He says there was regular information-sharing between the mills and their suppliers that benefited both sides.
sentences.chinese: 他谈到钢铁企业和供货商经常信息共享，双方获益。

sentences.english: We expect to produce series of W-Mo-Fe alloys in order to satisfy the demands of iron and steel industry.
sentences.chinese: 希望能开发出系列化产品，满足钢铁工业的需求。

sentences.english: For sheer dynamism the Beijing Iron and Steel Company takes some beating.
sentences.chinese: 仅为了可持续的发展，北京钢铁公司没少挨批。

sentences.english: Japan might be able to unload more of its steel abroad.
sentences.chinese: 日本或许能向国外倾销更多的钢铁。

sentences.english: Praxair owns extensive experience in steel industry and contributes a number of innovative technologies.
sentences.chinese: 普莱克斯在钢铁领域具有丰富经验和诸多技术贡献。

sentences.english: The ship was launched at Odense Steel Shipyard Ltd in May 2007.
sentences.chinese: 这船是丹麦的欧登赛钢铁船厂建造的。

sentences.english: Our steel workers as you know, are now on strike.
sentences.chinese: 如你所知，我们的钢铁工人们现在正在罢工。

sentences.english: The screens have to be made from steel.
sentences.chinese: 窗户的防护格栅必须是钢铁制造的。

definition: non-ferrous metals (all metals excluding iron, chromium, manganese and their alloys)
steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc
chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
coke (processed coal used in blast furnace)
